alert.note: Alert for Newton County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 21 at 2:24AM CST until January 22 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Ice Storm Warning, significant icing expected. Total ice accumulations of one quarter to one half inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 5 below zero. * WHERE: Portions of northern Arkansas. * WHEN...For the Ice Storm Warning, from 10 PM this evening to 3 PM CST Monday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Be sure to check road conditions before traveling in these areas. Visit the Arkansas Department of Transportation`s website Idrivearkansas.com for the latest road and traffic conditions.
